name: Fire Hell
description:
Aurise Games

Fire Hell is a "Bullet Hell" game in the space where you control a mini planet of the Solar system and try to survive as long as possible.

You can also bring your friends and play a VERSUS mode, up to 4 players!

This game was made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #2 #BTPGameJam

I used Unity, Slate, Bosca Ceoil and Audacity.
